column4: hi i have installed ubuntu and im also running an adsl modem via USB port so how can i setup my network ?
i have installed ubuntu and im also running an adsl modem via USB port so how can i setup my network ?
i think your best bet would be to use actual ethernet instead of usb.
but i wanna use a USB
i cant get ethernet around my area
i cant get ethernet around my area
i said i cant get it i cant get it
now do how so i setup my network via adsl/USB ?

the chances of you getting your usb adsl modem to work with ubuntu is slim to none.  my guess would be none.  usb was never for networking, ethernet is, so i dont mean to be rude, but i dont know how it would kill you to just go and buy an ethernet cable for $5
